tool_description: Orchestrates execution of complete test scenarios by coordinating multiple test steps and managing test flow control.

scenario_name.description: Name of the test scenario to execute

test_steps.description: Ordered list of test step identifiers to execute

continue_on_failure.description: Whether to continue execution when a step fails

step_delay_ms.description: Delay between test steps in milliseconds

max_execution_time.description: Maximum scenario execution time in seconds

cleanup_on_failure.description: Whether to run cleanup steps if scenario fails

error_messages: Empty test steps: test_steps array cannot be empty. Provide at least one test step.
Scenario execution failed: One or more test steps failed and continue_on_failure is false.
Execution timeout: Scenario exceeded max_execution_time. Increase timeout or optimize test steps.
Invalid step identifier: One or more test step identifiers are not recognized.
usage: Provide scenario_name and test_steps array to execute a complete test scenario. Configure continue_on_failure, step_delay_ms, and other execution parameters as needed for your testing requirements.

scenario_status.description: Overall scenario execution status: passed, failed, timeout

steps_executed.description: Number of test steps successfully executed

total_steps.description: Total number of test steps in scenario

execution_time_ms.description: Total scenario execution time in milliseconds

failed_steps.description: List of test step identifiers that failed
